Write a Review (Opens in a new window)

OMG!!   Using this shampoo bar was an experience you can’t wait to share. Skeptical at first- using a bar on my thick curly hair -born of mixed  ethnicities … thank God I was overwhelmingly impressed.  Curls were bouncy & vibrant immediately after shampooing- b4 adding conditioner... Love ❤️.. love your products . .. anxious to try out others

I'm in love! I was skeptical switching to bar shampoo just because it was outside my comfort zone but I'm amazed. I've always been conscious of staying away from harmful chemicals but this takes the cake.

I use the "painting" method on my scalp and the lather is so rich. It doesn't feel dry, but rather nourishing and cleansing. I actually think I "painted" too much because it was SO MUCH lather. A little goes a long way.

I paired it with the Shea Butter Conditioner bar and I'm absolutely sold. This was after my first use and I can't wait see the results after a few weeks transitioning from traditional product to clean Kitsch bars. I'm about to order a couple more for a nice rotation. Thank you Kitsch!

REFERENCE: Long natural blonde hair, thick and curly/wavy texture, frizz control issues and mild dandruff. Dryness/greasy spells depending on what products I'm using and environment I'm in as I live in Florida (humid) and Las Vegas (dry) throughout the year.

I recently tried the castor oil shampoo and conditioner line and LOVE it! It has a very light sweet scent and made my hair feel cleansed and moisturized without feeling heavy. I also put the new leave-in conditioner on my ends. It feels light and has a nice scent! With Kitsch hair products, I feel like I’m really taking care of my hair for the first time—I never got into buying expensive products at the salon. I’m super happy with Kitsch’s affordable products and I’m feeling like I’m finally taking care of my hair the way I’ve always taken care of my skin—Kitsch is hair care for hair like skin care is for skin! I’m a Kitsch customer for life! Highly recommend! Thank you, Kitsch!

PS The Kitsch shampoo and conditioner bags are so awesome and make using the products super easy and convenient!!! I now have two shampoo and conditioner sets (this Castor oil line and the Rosemary & Biotin line) and Kitsch body wash bar set.
I've been using the castor oil shampoo & the rosemary and biotin conditioners for a couple of weeks now.
I was pleasantly surprised by the luxurious lather ESPECIALLY from a bar!
I've noticed baby hairs coming in already too!
Also my hair looks and feels great so far!
The smell is awesome, first and foremost! Next, some info about me. I'm a melanated beauty with thick, dense, and curly/coily hair. Always very thirsty and I also suffer with scalp psoriasis.

After using the shampoo,  I squeezed out some access water and went in with this. Initially I was a bit concerned about how much hydration I would get, but as I rubbed the bar throughout and went in to emulsify, it felt pretty great. Not a super heavy feel, but my curls were loving the hydration as I let it sit for 5-7 mins or so.
Definitely want to make sure you thoroughly rinse, but I'm really happy with how my curls looked and felt after getting out of the shower! A winner so far, look forward to using it again

Was able to try the castor oil s&c and was a big difference for my curls. I have wavy/curly hair and generally doesn't hold curl very well without lots of product. Was able to test and used very little products and allowed my hair to air dry. Hair felt much softer, less frizz, and more defined curls that held longer. Will definitely be adding to my routine

Love this bar. My hair is thin and can get oily. This shampoo keeps my hair clean without stripping it and keeps it looking healthy, with body and shiny. People have commented on how healthy my hair is and has helped me grow it longer than I’ve had it in a long time.

It's the second time I buy from Kitsch and the products never dissapoint. My hair feels healthier, shinnier and stronger. I'm off traditional shampoos and I'm so happy I changed.  The change means no more plastic bottles are used every other week and giving natural "food" to my hair, so it's a win win.

What a difference this had made on my very dry gray/white hair! I have bra strap length single layer hair that I have been battling to keep from dryness and frizz. This shampoo along with the rosemary oil treatment has been just what I’ve been looking for!

I recently switched to this shampoo. So far (used twice) it has left my hair light and fluffy. On average I wash once or twice a week. With this shampoo feel like I have to wash at least twice a week because my hair does get a little greasy sooner than my previous shampoo. I have A LOT of wavy Hair, so it does keep my waves in tact too.

Long-term use of this shampoo promotes hair health and vitality by reducing damage, breakage and hair loss, ultimately leading to stronger, healthier hair.

This bar is suitable for all hair types, especially dry and damaged hair. It is also a great option for those with oily or high porosity hair. It helps to hydrate, reduce frizz, and strengthen hair.
Solid bars often last longer than traditional liquid shampoo and conditioners. With proper use and storage, a single bar can provide up to 100 uses!
Just like the rest of our products, our shampoo is free from harmful chemicals and is made with high-quality, nourishing ingredients like coconut oil to ensure the best care for your hair and scalp.

Founded by Wisconsin native Cassandra Thurswell at the age of 25, Kitsch is a global beauty powerhouse built on positivity and pure hard work. The brand supports its growing community with easy, elevated beauty solutions that are totally reliable, truly special, and made as sustainably as possible. Beginning in 2010 with a business plan no longer than a paragraph, Kitsch now supplies a full range of beauty favorites in over 20,000 retail locations worldwide. A prominent entrepreneur featured in Forbes and Inc., Cassandra continues to create elevated, sustainable beauty solutions for every moment of the day.
